overview: Acoustic guitar master Phil Keaggy shares his secrets in this comprehensive and entertaining personal guitar lesson. Covering techniques including alternate tunings, fingerpicking, flatpicking, sweep-picking, tapping, harmonics, and open-string chord voicings, Keaggy demonstrates a number of licks from 12 songs off of his three instrumental albums "Beyond Nature," "The Wind and the Wheat" and "The Master and the Musician."
title: Phil Keaggy: Acoustic Guitar Style
